content: i am so sorry i accidentally uploaded the wrong pdf i really apologize for the inconvenience i am uploading the correct one now these flowers are very easy to make and have so many design possibilities worsted weight yarn i used a #5 needle sock yarn i used a #0 needle you can easily make flowers anywhere from 2 5 to 8 across sizes are small medium and large these would be a great use for oddments of yarn approximate amounts needed are shown in the pattern for both worsted weight and sock yarn for all sizes if you don t want to use beads for the middle you could try french knits or tiny domed buttons written pattern is 6 pages has pictures and explanations to help in putting your flower together
